name: Slate Blue
description: A refined, corporate theme with cool slate blue and soft sky blue accents â€” ideal for enterprise, professional, and executive presentations.
css: :root { --primary: #64748b; --primary-rgb: 100,116,139; --secondary: #38bdf8; --secondary-rgb: 56,189,248; --tertiary: #94a3b8; --tertiary-rgb: 148,163,184; --background: #02040a; --background-alt: #0f172a; --surface: rgba(255,255,255,0.03); --surface-hover: rgba(255,255,255,0.06); --border: rgba(255,255,255,0.06); --border-hover: rgba(255,255,255,0.12); --text: rgba(255,255,255,0.9); --text-muted: rgba(255,255,255,0.5); --text-subtle: rgba(255,255,255,0.3); --gradient-title: linear-gradient(135deg, #94a3b8, #38bdf8); --gradient-progress: linear-gradient(90deg, #64748b, #38bdf8); --gradient-accent: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(100,116,139,0.2), rgba(56,189,248,0.2)); --orb1: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(100,116,139,0.15), transparent); --orb2: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(56,189,248,0.10), transparent); --nav-active-bg: rgba(56,189,248,0.5); --nav-active-border: rgba(56,189,248,0.7); }
